DOC.brief_summary: This is a single arm, phase 2, open-label, multicenter trial in patients with metastatic colorectal cancer (mCRC) and acquired resistance to anti-epidermal growth factor receptor (EGFR) monoclonal antibodies (mAbs) and documented mutation of extra cellular domain EGFR (ECD-EGFR).
DOC.brief_title: Sym004 in Metastatic Colorectal Cancer and ECD-EGFR Patients
DOC.criteria: Inclusion and Exclusion criteria have been removed due to Symphogen's business decision to no longer perform the clinical study.
